metadata.synopsis: Frank Ross (James Cagney) is an intrepid reporter hot on the trail of a corrupt politician when he is framed for vehicular manslaughter and sent to prison. There he meets the infamous gangster "Hood" Stacey (George Raft), and the two become fast friends when Stacey saves Ross from a deadly knife attack. When Stacey escapes from a courthouse, he promises that he will help clear Ross' name by finding the man who framed him. But can Ross really trust the word of a gangster?

reviews: The picture goes out in a blast of bombs and bullets: odd that it leaves so little impression behind.
An implausible but enjoyable routine crime drama featuring James Cagney and George Raft.
